timeline.bodyText: @g4s8 IIRC we have very similar implementations on a response object in takes and cactoos-http project. Wouldn't be a good idea to use one of them?
timeline.author: paulodamaso

replies.bodyText: @paulodamaso it's very different actually, please check the README. Response is reactive interface send() is called by server when it's ready to accept the data.
replies.author: g4s8

timeline.bodyText: @g4s8 This implementation is rather confuse to me: IMHO we the Response object should be created by the connection, and not the other way around. Also, the way it is implemented sends the status to the connection, which looks like strange because we just get the status AFTER we try to send something
